Interface SubCommand

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataSubCommand, DebugSubCommand, DevSubCommand, GiveItemSubCommand, GracePeriodSubcommand, HeartsSubCommand, HelpSubCommand, RecipeSubCommand, ReloadSubCommand

  • Method Details

    • execute

      boolean execute(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, String[] args)
      Execute the sub-command logic.
      Parameters:
      sender - Command sender
      args - Arguments passed to the command
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • getUsage

      String getUsage()
      Provides the usage description for the sub-command.
      Returns:
      A string representing command usage

    • hasPermission

      boolean hasPermission(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
      Checks if a sender has permission to use the sub-command.
      Parameters:
      sender - The command sender
      Returns:
      True if the sender has permission
